title: His Wicked Sins
description: In the quiet hamlet of Yorkshire, the hallowed halls of Burndale School stand…and evil lurks in its dark corners. For a serial killer with a proclivity for blonde women has struck again—this time, murdering two of its teachers. Now everyone is wondering when the killer will seek his next victim…Elizabeth Canham has accepted a teaching position at the local boarding school in Yorkshire. But her quiet life takes a surprising turn when she meets Griffin Fairfax—the handsome father of one of her pupils. His mesmerizing stare quickly draws her in, and she can’t deny the fierce attraction between them…Griffin Fairfax appears to be a doting father and gentleman. But one disturbing truth lies at the heart of the murders—all of the victims were intimately connected to him. When Elizabeth discovers this, she wonders if it’s a mere coincidence or if Griffin could be a charming, seductive killer so many women have lost their hearts—and lives—to…
author: Eve Silver
